The Treasury.scope: This appropriation is limited to the net increase (excluding actuarial gains and losses) in the Crown's liability for benefits payable to members of National Provident Fund schemes under the Crown guarantee in section 60 of the National Provident Fund Restructuring Act 1990. This appropriation is authorised by section 66 of the National Provident Fund Restructuring Act 1990.

The Treasury.name: Policy Advice - Finance
The Treasury.scope: This appropriation is limited to the provision of advice (including second opinion advice and contributions to policy advice led by other agencies) to support decision-making by Ministers on government policy matters relating to Finance.

The Treasury.name: Unwind of Discount Rate used in the Present Value Calculation of Payment under Crown Deed of Support with AMI
The Treasury.scope: This appropriation is limited to the expense incurred in unwinding the discount rate used in the present value calculation of the liability as the liability nears settlement.

The Treasury.name: Direct Sale costs for Implementing the Mixed Ownership Model
The Treasury.scope: This appropriation is limited to the direct sales costs of implementing the Mixed Ownership Model.

The Treasury.name: Government Superannuation Fund Authority – Crown’s Share of Expenses
The Treasury.scope: This appropriation is limited to the Crown’s share of the expenses of the Government Superannuation Fund Authority relating to the management and administration of the Government Superannuation Fund and the schemes, authorised by sections 15E and 95 of the Government Superannuation Act 1956.

The Treasury.name: Provision of Financial Operations Services and Operational Advice
The Treasury.scope: This appropriation is limited to the provision of services which support the performance of the State sector, including fiscal reporting, forecasting and monitoring; provision of Export Credit; and the management, administration and monitoring of Crown Guarantee Schemes, Crown Lending, Crown Investments and Crown Bank Accounts.

The Treasury.name: New Zealand House, London
The Treasury.scope: This appropriation is limited to the operational costs of New Zealand House, London.

The Treasury.name: Implementation of Mixed Ownership Model
The Treasury.scope: This appropriation is limited to the policy, operational, and transactional work to implement the Mixed Ownership Model.

The Treasury.name: Shared Support Services
The Treasury.scope: This appropriation is limited to provision of support services to other agencies.

The Treasury.name: Administration of Crown Borrowing
The Treasury.scope: This appropriation is limited to expenses incurred in connection with administering borrowing by the Crown, as authorised by section 61(1) of the Public Finance Act 1989.

The Treasury.name: Crown Company Monitoring Advice to the Minister for State-Owned Enterprises and Other Responsible Ministers
The Treasury.scope: This appropriation is limited to the provision of ownership, performance monitoring and governance advice to the Minister for State Owned Enterprises and other responsible Ministers in respect of the Ministers' shareholding responsibilities or as responsible Ministers for the New Zealand Lotteries Commission and Public Trust.

The Treasury.name: Inquiries into Productivity - Related Matters
The Treasury.scope: This output class is limited to inquiries undertaken by the New Zealand Productivity Commission in accordance with the New Zealand Productivity Commission Act 2010.

The Treasury.name: Landcorp Protected Land Agreement
The Treasury.scope: Purchase (including by reinvesting cash dividends) of redeemable preference shares in Landcorp under the Protected Land Agreement.

The Treasury.name: The Treasury - Capital Expenditure
The Treasury.scope: This appropriation is limited to the purchase or development of assets by and for the use of the Treasury, as authorised by section 24(1) of the Public Finance Act 1989.

The Treasury.name: Administration of Derivative Transactions
The Treasury.scope: This appropriation is limited to expenses incurred in connection with administering derivative transactions of the Crown, as authorised by section 65H(2) of the Public Finance Act 1989.

The Treasury.name: Administration of Guarantees and Indemnities given by the Crown
The Treasury.scope: This appropriation is limited to expenses incurred in connection with administering of guarantees and indemnities given by the Crown, as authorised by section 65ZG of the Public Finance Act 1989.

The Treasury.name: Management of New Zealand House, London
The Treasury.scope: This appropriation is limited to the property management services in respect of New Zealand House, London.

The Treasury.name: Impairment of Loans to Taitokerau Forest Limited
The Treasury.scope: This appropriation is limited to the expense incurred on the impairment of new loans to Taitokerau Forests Limited.

The Treasury.name: Taitokerau Forests
The Treasury.scope: This appropriation is limited to the provision of loans to Taitokerau Forests Ltd for forest management and development.

The Treasury.name: Administration of Investment of Public Money
The Treasury.scope: This appropriation is limited to expenses incurred in connection with administering the investment of public money, as authorised by section 65J(1) of the Public Finance Act 1989.

The Treasury.name: Crown Company Monitoring Advice to the Minister of Science and Innovation and the Minister for Economic Development
The Treasury.scope: This appropriation is limited to the provision of ownership, performance monitoring, and governance advice to the Minister of Science and Innovation and other responsible Ministers in respect of the Ministers' shareholding responsibilities.

The Treasury.name: New Zealand House, London, capital
The Treasury.scope: This appropriation is limited to capital expenditure in relation to New Zealand House, London.

The Treasury.name: Management of the New Zealand Superannuation Fund
The Treasury.scope: This appropriation is limited to managing the New Zealand Superannuation Fund on behalf of the Crown.

The Treasury.name: Research into and Promotion of Productivity - Related Matters
The Treasury.scope: This output class is limited to the New Zealand Productivity Commission undertaking research into and promoting public understanding of productivity related matters in accordance with the New Zealand Productivity Commission Act 2010.

The Treasury.name: Geothermal Wells Fund
The Treasury.scope: This appropriation is limited to meeting the costs of one-off unforeseen events relating to those geothermal wells for which the Crown accepts responsibility.

The Treasury.name: Provision of Financial Services to the New Zealand Local Government Funding Agency
The Treasury.scope: This appropriation is limited to expenses incurred in connection with the provision of financial services on a commercial basis to the New Zealand Local Government Funding Agency (LGFA).

The Treasury.name: Unclaimed Money
The Treasury.scope: This appropriation is limited to the repayment of money authorised by section 74(5) of the Public Finance Act 1989.

The Treasury.name: Unclaimed Trust Money
The Treasury.scope: This appropriation is limited to the repayment of money authorised by section 70(2) of the Public Finance Act 1989.

The Treasury.name: Crown Residual Liabilities
The Treasury.scope: Residual obligations arising from administration of the Crown's sale and purchase agreements with SOEs and Crown entities and from the sale of Crown investments, and for the settlement of claims against the Crown arising from exposure to asbestos.

The Treasury.name: Taitokerau Forests Limited Grant
The Treasury.scope: This appropriation is limited to grants to Taitokerau Forests Limited for on-payment to forest owners, payable upon harvest of the forests.

The Treasury.name: Management of the Crown's Obligations for Geothermal Wells
The Treasury.scope: This appropriation is limited to the management and maintenance relating to geothermal wells and associated sites and structures for which the Crown accepts responsibility.

The Treasury.name: Government Superannuation Appeals Board
The Treasury.scope: This appropriation is limited to the expenses of the Government Superannuation Appeals Board in performing its functions under the Government Superannuation Fund Act 1956.
